price: 71. Katakanlah (Muhammad), “Bagaimana pendapatmu, jika Allah menjadikan untukmu malam itu terus-menerus sampai hari Kiamat. Siapakah tuhan selain Allah yang akan mendatangkan sinar terang kepadamu? Apakah kamu tidak mendengar?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in jaʿala al-lahu ʿalaykumu al-layla sarmadan ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum biḍiyāin afalā tasmaʿūna
